title: What is the song with the lyrics, 'woah oh woah oh woah oh oh oh yeah yeah and it's my intention'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ex-Hex - How You Got that Girl I’ve been the object (whoa, oh, oh)Of your affection (whoa, oh, oh)And I’ve been the target (whoa, oh, oh)Of your cruel intention (oh, oh, oh) Neon Dreams - Find A Way I've got every intention of making this work I've got every intention yeah... For love to find a way(Wa ohh whoa oh oh oo oo) Love will find a way (Wa ohh whoa oh oh oo oo) Love to find a way - Many songs these days have ‘woah oh” in them, but these are some that I thought sounded like what you described. Hope you find the song! :)

That’s too vague for anyone who doesn’t already know what song you’re thinking of to be able to find it for you. I’d suggest googling lyrics “it’s my intention” (with the quotation marks) and looking through lyric results until you find it. Or using an app like SoundHound or Shazam, if you know the melody better than the lyrics, to identify it.
